function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Cold air causing vasoconstriction of the respiratory tract and weakening of the immune system","Impact":"Increased susceptibility to contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Use of appropriate clothing and heating methods to maintain optimal temperature","Technologies":"Heating systems, air purifiers","People":"Individuals in cold climates","Owner":"Health organizations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Dry cold air making the nasal mucosa prone to small ruptures, creating opportunities for virus invasion","Impact":"Increased risk of virus invasion and infection","Mitigation":"Use of nasal moisturizers, air humidifiers","Technologies":"Nasal moisturizers, air humidifiers","People":"Individuals in cold climates","Owner":"Health organizations, individuals"},{"Description":"Low or extremely cold temperature playing a positive role in reducing the transmission of coronavirus","Impact":"Reduced transmission of coronavirus","Mitigation":"N/A","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Population in locations with low or extremely cold temperatures","Owner":"Health organizations, government agencies"}]}
